fields.headline: Today at the Open
fields.bodyText: Great groups 7.36am Davis Love III, Darren Clarke, Shingo Katayama. 9.09am Sergio Garcia, Tiger Woods, Luke Donald. 1.54pm Shigeki Maruyama, Ernie Els, David Toms. Worth catching 9.42am Nick Faldo, Tom Lehman, Thomas Bjorn. 11.59am Mark Calcavecchia, K J Choi, Fredrik Jacobson. 2.16pm Jim Furyk, Trevor Immelman, Paul Casey. Prime location Panoramic views for spectators from on top of the "Maiden", beside the 6th green. Weather eye Cooler with showers, especially in the afternoon. Rainfall 15mm. Temp 65F/18C. Wind watch SSW. Winds will be gusting to 30mph later in the day.
